description:
Heading out into the cold is easier with cozy ears. On those days where frigid temperatures take the shine off of your activity, the ThermoNet Headband makes stepping out a little easier. By wrapping your head in a soft and warm material, this headband focuses warmth where you need it most, while still letting you vent off extra heat.

  • PrimaLoft® ThermoNet uses technical construction to keep weight low and warmth high, it is 4x warmer than standard microfleece
  • Soft materials wicks away moisture
  • Bonded construction means no seams for a complete comfort while wearing a helmet
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: Buff ThermoNet Headband 2 - Unisex
